name: Margherita Mug Eggs
author: Aliboo
summary: I make eggs in a mug quite often. It's easy and so versatile you can add pretty much anything that's in your fridge!  Try it with ham, swiss and asparagus! Or maybe those cooked frozen sausages cut up with peppers and onions! You can even top it with pizza sauce and pepperoni!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 teaspoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Brush the inside of a microwave-safe mug with butter
Crack eggs into mug and top with ricotta cheese, tomatoes, and basil; season with salt, pepper, and oregano
Cook in the microwave for 1 minute; stir and continue cooking in 15-second intervals, until set, about 1 minute more
